verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Idithun, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* psalm \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Shall not \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w subject|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* salvation.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* saviour: \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w protector|strong="H6697"\w*, \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* moved \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w long|strong="H6440"\w* do \w you|strong="H3588"\w* rush \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* man? \w you|strong="H3588"\w* all kill, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* thrusting \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* leaning wall, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* tottering fence.

\w But|strong="H0168"\w* they have thought \w to|strong="H0168"\w* cast \w away|strong="H3671"\w* \w my|strong="H0168"\w* price; \w I|strong="H3671"\w* ran \w in|strong="H5769"\w* thirst: they blessed \w with|strong="H0168"\w* their mouth, \w but|strong="H0168"\w* cursed \w with|strong="H0168"\w* their heart.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* soul, \w subject|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* patience.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* saviour: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* helper, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3254"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* moved.

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* salvation \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* glory: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* help, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* hope \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3117"\w*, \w all|strong="H3117"\w* ye congregation \w of|strong="H3117"\w* people: pour out \w your|strong="H3117"\w* hearts \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3117"\w*. \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3651"\w* helper \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.
But vain are the sons of men, the sons of men are liars in the balances: that by vanity they may together deceive.
Trust not in iniquity, and cover not robberies: if riches abound, set not your heart upon them.
God hath spoken once, these two things have I heard, that power belongeth to God,
And mercy to thee, O Lord; for thou wilt render to every man according to his works.
